com.datumbox.framework.statistics.descriptivestatistics

Class Descriptives

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.statistics.descriptivestatistics.Descriptives

  • public class Descriptives
extends Object
    This class provides several methods to estimate Descriptive Statistics about a particular list of values.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

      static double autocorrelation(FlatDataList flatDataList, int lags)
      Calculates the autocorrelation of a flatDataCollection for a predifined lag

      Calculates the covariance for a given transposed array (2xn table)

      Calculates Coefficient of variation

      Calculates the median.

      Calculates Minimum - Nulls are handled as zeros.

      Calculates the modes (more than one if found).

      Calculates Moment R if the mean is not known.
      static double moment(FlatDataCollection flatDataCollection, int r, double mean)
      Calculates Moment R if the mean is known.
      static void normalize(AssociativeArray associativeArray)
      Normalizes the provided associative array by dividing its values with the sum of the observations.
      static void normalizeExp(AssociativeArray associativeArray)
      Normalizes the exponentials of provided associative array by using the log-sum-exp trick.

      • kurtosis

        public static double kurtosis(FlatDataCollection flatDataCollection)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates Kurtosis. Uses a formula similar to SPSS as suggested in their documentation (local help)
        Parameters:
        flatDataCollection -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • kurtosisSE

        public static double kurtosisSE(FlatDataCollection flatDataCollection)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates Standard Error of Kurtosis. Uses a formula similar to SPSS as suggested by http://suite101.com/article/kurtosis-and-how-it-is-calculated-by-statistics-software-packages-a235641
        Parameters:
        flatDataCollection -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
